Package ca.mcgill.ecse211.project

Class OdometerCorrector

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse211.project.OdometerCorrector
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Runnable

    public class OdometerCorrector
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Runnable
    The OdometerCorrector class finds out if it is safe for the robot to move to the next tile, uses the light sensors to correct the odometer.
    Author:
    Han Zhou, George Kandalaft

      • getHeading

        public static int getHeading​()
        Get the heading of the robot
        Returns:
        0 if heading east (x+) 1 if heading north (y-) 2 if heading west (x-) 3 if heading south (y+)

      • pollLight

        public int pollLight​()
        get the light readings from the colorSensor
        Returns:
        0 if no line is detected, 1 if only colorsensor_1 detected line, 2 if only colorsensor_2 detected line, 3 if both.
